title: Is there API documentation for Lobsters somewhere?
description: Sorry if this was answered somewhere before, but I tried searching the site with no luck.
description_plain: Sorry if this was answered somewhere before, but I tried searching the site with no luck.

submitter_user.about:

comments.comment:
There is no authenticated API at this point, just JSON representations of various pages.

https://lobste.rs/hottest.json

https://lobste.rs/newest.json

https://lobste.rs/s/r9oskz.json

comments.comment: Is https://lobste.rs/u/markerz.json unsupported? Just curious why it’s unlisted.
comments.comment_plain: Is https://lobste.rs/u/markerz.json unsupported?  Just curious why it's unlisted.

comments.comment: It wasn’t meant to be a complete list, just things I remembered off the top of my head. There may be more, and those resources that don’t have JSON versions can be added fairly easily.
comments.comment_plain: It wasn't meant to be a complete list, just things I remembered off the top of my head.  There may be more, and those resources that don't have JSON versions can be added fairly easily.

comments.comment: Is there a newest equivalent for comments? I am building http://gitspo.com and this would be extremely useful.
